# CONTROL STRUCTURES

##   *if - else*


if (condition){
  ## some code
} else {
  ## some more
}

if (condition) {
  
} else if (condition 2){
  
  
}  else {
    
 }


Special R if-else construction:

``` {r}
x <- 6
y <- if (x >3) {
  10
}else  {
  0
}
```


## *For loops*


```{r 4 loops}
x <- c("a", "b", "c", "d")

for (i in 1:4) {
   print(x[i])
}

for (i in seq_along(x)) { ## creates integer sequence equal to the length                            ## of x (4)
  print(x[i])
}

for (letter in x) {
  print(letter) 
}

for (i in 1:4) print (x[i])
```


## Nested for loops

``` {r nested loops}
x <- matrix(1:6,2,3)

for (i in seq_len(nrow(x))) {
    for (j in seq_len(ncol(x))) {
        print(x[i, j])
    }
  
}
```
